items: Attach the resistance band to a sturdy anchor point at shoulder height.
Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Hold the resistance band with both hands, palms facing inwards and arms extended in front of you.
Slowly pull the resistance band towards your chest, keeping your arms straight and shoulder blades squeezed together.
Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly release back to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

Can help alleviate lower back pain by strengthening the muscles that support the spine
